SEARCH
Package Others

Class TextDBPayment

java.lang.Object
Others.TextDB
Others.TextDBPayment
public class TextDBPayment extends TextDB
This class has functions to implement the saving of payment types into their respective repositories for the purpose of data persistence. The repositories come in the form of text files which can be read from and written to using the readPaymentMethods and savePaymentMethods functions.

  • Method Details

    • readPaymentMethods

      public static List<String[]> readPaymentMethods(String filename, boolean nameL) throws IOException
      Reads payment methods from a text file and optionally creates a mapping of payment method names to their corresponding class names.
      Parameters:
      filename - The path of the text file to read from.
      nameL - Determines whether to return a list of names or a map of names to class names.
      Returns:
      Either a List of strings (payment method names) or a Map of names to class names.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file reading.

    • readPaymentMethods

      public static List<String> readPaymentMethods(String filename) throws IOException
      This function reads the payment options from a given .txt file and returns them as an ArrayList of String.
      Parameters:
      filename - File path to read data from
      Returns:
      List of Strings representing the payment options
      Throws:
      IOException

    • savePaymentMethods

      public static void savePaymentMethods(String FILENAME, List<String[]> al) throws IOException
      Saves the data of payment method mappings to a text file.
      Parameters:
      FILENAME - The path of the file to write to.
      al - A List of string arrays, each containing a payment method name and class name.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file writing.
